title: Israel Consumer Credit
description: Consumer Credit in Israel increased to 748.37 ILS Billion in August from 741.98 ILS Billion in July of 2022. Consumer Credit in Israel averaged 280.61 ILS Billion from 1992 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 748.37 ILS Billion in August of 2022 and a record low of 29.96 ILS Billion in September of 1992. This page provides - Israel Consumer Credit- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Israel
